item.description:
Hi Packers,

Thank you and welcome to all of the new Packers who have joined the club we hope you enjoy the bar with your fellow Packers, we are up to 188 members now. 2 - 0 to start the season, not bad, next week the game is at 4.15pm against Chicago and the 2nd floor will be open from 3pm, if you want to get to the bar early for the 1pm games they will be available on the 1st floor. We have just started a new twitter account, please follow us @packersboston. As always if you have any feedback or input please let me know, have a great week and GO PACK.

Ray Butler
item.how_to_find_us: The Banshee Pub, 934 Dorchester Ave, Dorchester, Ma, 02125

group.name: The Boston Green Bay Packers Meetup Group

item.name: Green Bay Packers vs Chicago
